page.title: 12WARGRAVE CHILD'S FAMILY LIFE
page.content: {My Life at Home} My Mum does her weekly{shopping}at a Henley super-market.Every now and then we go to Department stores in Reading. I do not like going shopping with the family because my Mum always goes off leaving my Dad and I to search for her and my sisters.I sometimes wonder why we ever go as I sometimes find it a bit of a drag but when I get something nice I reckon it is worth the bother. I like my Mum's{cooking}and most of my Dad's.I like his scrambled eggs.My Mum does lunches and for Sunday lunch Dad prepares the potatoes and Mum cooks a joint of meat and vegetables.We also have a supper during the week such as beefburgers,fish,potatoes,chips,peas. Mum{washes clothes}in a machine and dries them on a line hung outside.She does all the ironing.For{washing up}we have a machine,we dry the pots & pans.
